top_comment.text:
Vi muita gente gostando da presença do Marco Luque, mas não gosto do humor 
dele, acho sem graça. Para mim, realmente não é ele que completa os 
Barbixas. Para mim, quem chegou o mais perto de completar foi o Gustavo 
Miranda. Amava aquele colombiano, realmente faz falta, o humor dele era 
demais. Ou também o Edu Nunes, ele faz um ótimo trabalho junto ao grupo. 
Achei este vídeo fraco, mas vou esperar por um que faça mais meu tipo, ou 
que os Barbixas venham para minha cidade (Novo Hamburgo - Rio Grande do 
Sul). :D﻿

captions.text:
"Improbable Musical",
everybody plays, stand up.

In "Improbable Musical",
they will sing, dance, act,

and to begin, we will use one of
the sentences you wrote for us,

which is
'tears are not arguments'.

What a great name
for a musical, right?

'Tears are not arguments' is the title
of "Improbable Musical", starting now!

- You're such a fool!
- Why?

What does he do? He just
weeps and you take him back?

- I...
- You're such a fool!
He was weeping because he was moved...

Where do you find a
man who weeps nowadays?

- He's pretending, dummy!
- How can you pretend to weep?

- What's the matter?
- See?
If this is him, I'll kick him out!

You won't kick him out!
This is my house!

- Hey, ba...
- Hey, baby!

- Hey, baby! What is she doing here?
- She's making a scene, that's all!

- How are you? What do you mean, a scene?
- A scene!

- Look, I'm going for a walk in the park...
- Bye, jealous Sônia!

What is this? I want to set
things straight before you go...
Cut it out, Sônia...

- What did you do, I didn't get it...
- I closed the door.
Right.

So you didn't go out,
time to clear things up...

I'd love to clear it up, let
me tell you what's going on...
Sônia...

You've been cheating on
my friend for some time

She gets emotional
like she was in a shrine

- She thinks she have a prayer
- Don't talk like that!

But I know that
you are just a player

- You nailed Angélica, Flávia, Suzana, Carlinha
- No, no, no
That's just the beginning

Then you come with your
tears wanting her back to you

I'm out, I'll get my
running shoes, screw you!

Tábata, this girl
is delirious, Tábata!

She's delirious, Tábata!
I would never do that to you!

You know, I'm always
around, I love you...
I don't... You know...

- The things... She...
- Don't cry, baby, it's okay...
I don't believe it!

I like you so much!
I'm yours!

I believe you, you're
so beautiful when you weep!
That's nice... That's strong!
I'm working out!
Your phone, baby!

- Your phone...
- I'll get it!

- Hello?
- Hi, handsome!

Hi mom, how are you?
Do you need anything there?
Come over here, daddy!

Do you need anything,
I can go to the bakery...
I need you with me now!
You want some milk? Okay!
You know what I want to know

I want to know, have you talked to her yet?
Does she know I'm your only pet?
